## CdkVirtualScrollPagingComponent class

Paging that Angular CDK virtual scroll to load more content

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class CdkVirtualScrollPagingComponent extends PagingAbstractComponent<CssClassesCdkVirtualScrollPaging, CdkVirtualScrollPagingOptions> implements CdkVirtualScrollPaging, OnDestroy 
```

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |

|  [(constructor)(pluginElement, changeDetector, gridPlugins, options)](./grid-material.cdkvirtualscrollpagingcomponent._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>CdkVirtualScrollPagingComponent</code> class |

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |

|  [\_displayedPages](./grid-material.cdkvirtualscrollpagingcomponent._displayedpages.md) |  | <code>number</code> | Currently displayed pages |
|  [\_scrollRangeChangeSubscription](./grid-material.cdkvirtualscrollpagingcomponent._scrollrangechangesubscription.md) |  | <code>Subscription</code> | Subscription for changes of displayed range in cdk virtual scroll viewport |
|  [\_scrollViewport](./grid-material.cdkvirtualscrollpagingcomponent._scrollviewport.md) |  | <code>CdkVirtualScrollViewport</code> | Instance of angular CDK virtual scroll viewport assigned to parent content renderer |
|  [\_totalCount](./grid-material.cdkvirtualscrollpagingcomponent._totalcount.md) |  | <code>number</code> | Number of all items that are paged with current filter criteria |
|  [firstItemIndex](./grid-material.cdkvirtualscrollpagingcomponent.firstitemindex.md) |  | <code>number</code> | Zero based index of first displayed item on page |
|  [itemsPerPage](./grid-material.cdkvirtualscrollpagingcomponent.itemsperpage.md) |  | <code>number</code> | Gets or sets number of items currently used for paging |
|  [page](./grid-material.cdkvirtualscrollpagingcomponent.page.md) |  | <code>number</code> | Gets or sets index of currently selected page - NOT USED |
|  [totalCount](./grid-material.cdkvirtualscrollpagingcomponent.totalcount.md) |  | <code>number</code> | Gets or sets number of all items that are paged with current filter criteria |
